name: Shrine
description: A sacred shrine provides spiritual comfort and attracts pilgrims, creating opportunities for religious experience and community, but the religious significance can attract both devotees and desecrators. The spiritual focus can provide healing and guidance, while the sacred nature creates unique social and legal protections.
atmosphere: Warm candlelight flickers across golden icons and sacred symbols. Sweet incense smoke curls through still air. Soft chanting echoes off weathered stone walls. Worn prayer mats and small offerings of flowers and coins surround a simple altar.
